ve-chart/need-update.description: Whether echarts need update or not

ve-bar-chart/title.description:
Title component, including main title and subtitle. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#title

ve-bar-chart/legend.description:
Legend component shows symbol, color and name of different series. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#legend

ve-bar-chart/x-axis.description:
The x axis in cartesian(rectangular) coordinate. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#xAxis

ve-bar-chart/y-axis.description:
The y axis in cartesian(rectangular) coordinate. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#yAxis

ve-bar-chart/polar.description:
Polar coordinate can be used in scatter and line chart. Every polar coordinate has an `angleAxis` and a `radiusAxis`. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#polar

ve-bar-chart/angle-axis.description:
The angle axis in Polar Coordinate. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#angleAxis

ve-bar-chart/data-zoom.description:
dataZoom component is used for zooming a specific area, which enables user to investigate data in detail, or get an overview of the data, or get rid of outlier points. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#dataZoom

ve-bar-chart/visual-map.description:
visualMap is a type of component for visual encoding, which maps the data to visual channels. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#visualMap

ve-bar-chart/axis-pointer.description:
This is the global configurations of axisPointer. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#axisPointer

ve-bar-chart/toolbox.description:
A group of utility tools, which includes `export`, `data view`, `dynamic type switching`, `data area zooming`, and `reset`. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#toolbox

ve-bar-chart/brush.description:
brush is an area-selecting component, with which user can select part of data from a chart to display in detail, or do calculations with them. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#brush

ve-bar-chart/geo.description:
Geographic coorinate system component is used to draw maps, which also supports `scatter series`, and `line series`. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#geo

ve-bar-chart/parallel.description:
`Parallel Coordinates` is a common way of visualizing high-dimensional geometry and analyzing multivariate data. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#parallel

ve-bar-chart/parallel-axis.description:
This component is the coordinate axis for parallel coordinate. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#parallelAxis

ve-bar-chart/single-axis.description:
An axis with a single dimension. It can be used to display data in one dimension. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#singleAxis

ve-bar-chart/timeline.description:
`timeline` component, which provides functions like switching and playing between multiple ECharts options. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#timeline

ve-bar-chart/graphic.description:
`graphic` component enables creating graphic elements in ECharts. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#graphic

ve-bar-chart/dataset.description:
dataset brings convenience in data management separated with styles and enables data reuse by different series. More importantly, it enables data encoding from data to visual, which brings convenience in some scenarios. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#dataset

ve-bar-chart/aria.description:
The W3C has developed the WAI-ARIA, the Accessible Rich Internet Applications Suite, which is dedicated to making web content and web applications accessible. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#aria

ve-bar-chart/series.description:
Define echarts built-in chart types series. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#series

ve-bar-chart/color.description:
The color list of palette. If no color is set in series, the colors would be adopted sequentially and circularly from this list as the colors of series. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#color

ve-bar-chart/background-color.description:
Background color. Defaults to have no background. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#backgroundColor

ve-bar-chart/animation-threshold.description:
Whether to set graphic number threshold to animation. Animation will be disabled when graphic number is larger than threshold. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#animationThreshold

ve-bar-chart/animation-duration.description:
Duration of the first animation, which supports callback function for different data to have different animation effect. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#animationDuration

ve-bar-chart/animation-easing.description:
Easing method used for the first animation. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#animationEasing

ve-bar-chart/animation-delay.description:
Delay before updating the first animation, which supports callback function for different data to have different animation effect. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#animationDelay

ve-bar-chart/animation-duration-update.description:
Time for animation to complete, which supports callback function for different data to have different animation effect. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#animationDurationUpdate

ve-bar-chart/animation-delay-update.description:
Delay before updating animation, which supports callback function for different data to have different animation effects. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#animationDelayUpdate

ve-bar-chart/blend-mode.description:
Sets the type of compositing operation to apply when drawing a new shape. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#blendMode

ve-bar-chart/hover-layer-threshold.description:
When the number of element of the whole chart is larger than hoverLayerThreshold, a seperate hover layer is used to render hovered elements. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#hoverLayerThreshold

ve-bar-chart/useUTC.description:
Whether to use UTC in display. 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#useUTC

ve-bar-chart/options.description:
Option array used in `timeline`. Each item of this array is an echarts option (ECUnitOption). 
 https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#options

ve-bar-chart/selectchanged.description:
Event emitted when data selection is changed. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.selectchanged

ve-bar-chart/legendselectchanged.description:
[legendToggleSelect](https://echarts.apache.org/v4/zh/api.html#action.legend.legendToggleSelect) Event emitted after legend selecting state changes. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.legendselectchanged

ve-bar-chart/legendselected.description:
[legendSelect](https://echarts.apache.org/v4/zh/api.html#action.legend.legendSelect) Event emitted after legend is selected. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.legendselected

ve-bar-chart/legendselectall.description:
[legendAllSelect](https://echarts.apache.org/v4/zh/api.html#action.legend.legendAllSelect) Event emitted after all legends are selected. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.legendselectall

ve-bar-chart/legendinverseselect.description:
[legendInverseSelect](https://echarts.apache.org/v4/zh/api.html#action.legend.legendInverseSelect) Event emitted after inversing all legends. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.legendinverseselect

ve-bar-chart/datazoom.description:
Event emitted after zooming data area. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.datazoom

ve-bar-chart/datarangeselected.description:
[selectDataRange](https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#action.dataRange.selectDataRange) Event emitted after range is changed in visualMap. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.datarangeselected

ve-bar-chart/timelinechanged.description:
[timelineChange](https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#action.timeline.timelineChange) Event emitted after time point in timeline is changed. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.timelinechanged

ve-bar-chart/timelineplaychanged.description:
[timelinePlayChange](https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#action.timeline.timelinePlayChange) Switching event of play state in timeline. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.timelineplaychanged

ve-bar-chart/dataviewchanged.description:
Changing event of [data view tool in toolbox](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#toolbox.feature.dataView). 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.dataviewchanged

ve-bar-chart/magictypechanged.description:
Switching event of [magic type tool in toolbox](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#toolbox.feature.magicType). 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.magictypechanged

ve-bar-chart/geoselectchanged.description:
Event emitted after selecting state changes. It will be triggered when user clicks to select. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.geoselectchanged

ve-bar-chart/geoselected.description:
Event after selecting. Use `dispatchAction` can trigger this event, but user clicking this event won't trigger this. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.geoselected

ve-bar-chart/geounselected.description:
cancels selected event. Use `dispatchAction` will trigger this event, but user clicking won't trigger it. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.geounselected

ve-bar-chart/click.description:
Trigger when click the echarts instance. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.Mouse%20events.click

ve-bar-chart/dblclick.description:
Trigger when double click the echarts instance. 
 → https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.Mouse%20events.dblclick
